revised_title: Static Diffusion of Gases and Liquids: Its Significance in Natural Processes and Assimilation of Carbon in Plants
tldr: The authors investigate the static diffusion of gases and liquids in relation to carbon assimilation and translocation in plants. They discover that the diffusivity constant for dilute CO2 remains consistent across various conditions and that the rate of diffusion is directly proportional to the diameter of the aperture, not its area.
